content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill(position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner mining drill(position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
- Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
- Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab(position x=0.5, y=0.5), wooden chest(position x=2.5, y=0.5), burner inserter(position x=3.5, y=0.5), and wooden chest(position x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of burner inserter(position x=0.5, y=3.5), wooden chest(position x=0.5, y=2.5)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are not too far apart before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure that the pipe connections are valid and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Check the inventory of the entity before attempting to insert items.
- Make sure to remove or use up items from the inventory before inserting new items.

### Errors when using furnaces without ingredients
- Ensure that the furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt before starting them.
- Make sure to provide a constant supply of ingredients to the furnaces.

### Errors when using boilers without fluid connections
- Ensure that the boilers are connected to a fluid system before starting them.
- Make sure to provide a constant supply of fluid to the boilers.

### Errors when using inserters without source items
- Ensure that the inserters have a source of items to pick up before starting them.
- Make sure to provide a constant supply of items to the inserters.
